title: Number Types Venn Diagram
subject: Mathematics
description: An interactive Venn diagram that visualizes the hierarchical relationships between different types of numbers including Natural, Whole, Integers, Rational, Irrational, and Real numbers. Students can hover over regions to learn about each number type and see examples.
creator: Claude (Anthropic)
learningObjectives: Identify the hierarchical relationship between different number types
Understand that each inner set is a subset of the outer sets
Classify numbers into their appropriate categories
Recognize examples of each number type
Distinguish between rational and irrational numbers
prerequisites: Basic understanding of positive and negative numbers

controls.name: Show Labels
controls.description: Toggle visibility of number type labels

controls.name: Hover Tooltips
controls.description: Hover over any region to see a detailed explanation of that number type
